amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 118-487 to require the Secretary of Energy to disclose stakeholder meetings with entities that have ties to China; produced studies regarding or advocated for policy that limit, restrict, or ban the use of any type of energy; and have applied for or received Federal funds.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Steube amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Steube amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
